name: CUBE - Next Generation
description:
You wake up alone in an strange and unfamiliar environment.

You seem to be inside perfectly cube shaped room, with round vent exists on each wall. Where do they lead to? How do you escape? Who made this structure?

--------

Controls:

  • Forward: W
  • Backward: S
  • Strafe Left: A
  • Strafe Right: D
  • Crouch: C
  • Jump: [Spacebar]
  • Interact: E
  • Climb Ladders: Hold Left Shift

Climbing Mechanics:
Hold LEFT SHIFT to enable climbing.
While on the walls, W = Going Up and S = Going Down.
On the ceiling movement is normal WASD movement, as long as you stay on the ladders.

Vent Mechanics:
Once a vent has been opened after pressing E near to it.
Walk right into it, and your character will automatically crouch.
Holding Left Shift while in a vent will enable climbing.

Traps:

  • Static Saw Blades
  • Hidden Saw Blades
  • Projectile Saw Blades
  • Wall Lasers
  • Void Vents
  • Steam Outlets

Rooms:

  • No Traps
  • Saw Blade Rooms
  • Laser Room
  • Edge Room (Void Vents)
  • Mechanical Room
  • Portal Room (Start, End, Random Room)
